diagrams.constitutional_flow:
flowchart TD
    A[User Request] --> B[Executive Branch]
    B --> C[Project Manager: Strategic Coordination]
    C --> D[Development Minister: Implementation]
    D --> E[Technology Minister: Architecture]
    
    B --> F[Legislative Branch - Opposition]
    F --> G[Quality Shadow: Testing & Standards]
    G --> H[Innovation Shadow: Alternative Solutions]
    H --> I[Analytics Shadow: Data-Driven Insights]
    
    E --> J[Judicial Branch]
    I --> J
    J --> K[Chief Justice: Constitutional Compliance]
    K --> L{>95% Consensus?}
    L -->|Yes| M[Execute Implementation]
    L -->|No| N[Revision Required]
    N --> B
    M --> O[Update Memory Bank]
    O --> P[Continuous Monitoring]
diagrams.progress_flow:
flowchart LR
    A[Scratchpad Tasks] --> B[Kanban Board]
    B --> C{Task Status}
    C -->|Todo| D[Quality Shadow Review]
    C -->|In Progress| E[Development Minister]
    C -->|Testing| F[Multi-Platform Validation]
    C -->|Done| G[Chief Justice Approval]
    
    D --> H[Implementation Planning]
    E --> I[Real-time Progress Tracking]
    F --> J[LinkedIn + Naukri Testing]
    G --> K[Memory Bank Update]
    
    K --> L[Analytics Dashboard]
    L --> M[Performance Metrics]
    M --> N[Continuous Improvement]
diagrams.mcp_integration:
graph TB
    A[Job Scrapper System] --> B[MCP Integration Layer]
    
    B --> C[Context7 MCP]
    C --> D[Official Documentation]
    C --> E[Error Resolution]
    
    B --> F[Fetch MCP]
    F --> G[Web Content Retrieval]
    F --> H[API Documentation]
    
    B --> I[Memory MCP]
    I --> J[Pattern Storage]
    I --> K[Knowledge Retrieval]
    
    B --> L[Byterover MCP]
    L --> M[Cross-Project Learning]
    L --> N[Best Practices Sharing]
    
    D --> O[Auto-Fix Implementation]
    G --> P[Real-time Data Updates]
    J --> Q[Constitutional Precedents]
    M --> R[Skill Extraction Optimization]

project_visualization.architecture_diagram:
graph TD
    A[Streamlit UI] --> B[Scraper Manager]
    B --> C[LinkedIn Browser Scraper]
    B --> D[Naukri Bulk Scraper]
    
    C --> E[Selenium WebDriver]
    D --> F[Bulk HTML Downloader]
    
    F --> G[Batch Job URLs - 20 per batch]
    G --> H[Temporary HTML Files]
    H --> I[HTML File Parser - BeautifulSoup]
    
    E --> J[Job Data Extraction]
    I --> J
    
    J --> K[Skill Normalizer]
    K --> L[Triple-Layer Validation]
    L --> M[SQLite Database]
    
    M --> N[Analytics Dashboard]
    N --> O[CSV Export]
    
    P[Constitutional Framework] --> Q[Memory Bank]
    Q --> R[Autonomous Governance]
    R --> B
project_visualization.bulk_download_workflow:
flowchart TD
    A[Job Search Query] --> B[Card Extractor]
    B --> C[Extract Job URLs]
    C --> D{Batch Size = 20?}
    D -->|No| E[Add to Current Batch]
    D -->|Yes| F[Bulk HTML Downloader]
    
    E --> D
    F --> G[Download Job Pages]
    G --> H[Save to Temp Directory]
    H --> I[HTML File Parser]
    
    I --> J[Extract Job Description]
    I --> K[Extract Company Details]
    I --> L[Extract Skills via Regex]
    
    J --> M[Skill Normalizer]
    K --> M
    L --> M
    
    M --> N[Create JobModel]
    N --> O[Database Storage]
    O --> P[Cleanup Temp Files]
    
    P --> Q{More Batches?}
    Q -->|Yes| F
    Q -->|No| R[Complete]
project_visualization.data_flow:
sequenceDiagram
    participant U as User
    participant UI as Streamlit UI
    participant SM as Scraper Manager
    participant LS as LinkedIn Scraper
    participant BD as Bulk Downloader
    participant HP as HTML Parser
    participant SN as Skill Normalizer
    participant DB as SQLite Database
    
    U->>UI: Configure scraping parameters
    UI->>SM: Initialize scraping session
    SM->>LS: Scrape LinkedIn jobs (browser)
    SM->>BD: Download Naukri jobs (bulk)
    
    BD->>BD: Download 20 HTML files per batch
    BD->>HP: Process saved HTML files
    HP->>SN: Extracted job data + skills
    LS->>SN: Raw job data
    
    SN->>DB: Validated job records
    DB->>UI: Display results
    UI->>U: Show analytics & export
